verses.verse: The <S%H9294>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is against the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2317>Hadrach,<s%> with <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> as its <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place<s%> (for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> especially of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are toward the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>),
And <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> which <S%H1379>borders<s%> on it; <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> and <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2449>wise.<s%>

For <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> herself a <S%H4692>fortress<s%> And <S%H6651>piled<s%> up <S%H3701>silver<s%> like <S%H6083>dust,<s%> And <S%H2742>gold<s%> like the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> her And <S%H5221>cast<s%> her <S%H2428>wealth<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> And she will be <S%H398>consumed<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> [it] and be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> too will <S%H9123>writhe<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H9123>pain;<s%> Also <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> for her <S%H4007>expectation<s%> has <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>confounded.<s%> Moreover, the <S%H4428>king<s%> will perish from <S%H6>Gaza,<s%> And <S%H5804>Ashkelon<s%> will not be <S%H831>inhabited.<s%>
And a <S%H4464>mongrel<s%> <S%H4464>race<s%> will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And I will <S%H5493>remove<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>things<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth.<s%> Then they <S%H1571>also<s%> will be a <S%H7604>remnant<s%> for our <S%H430>God,<s%> And be like a <S%H441>clan<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> And <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> like a <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

But I will <S%H2583>camp<s%> around My <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of an <S%H4675>army,<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of him who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by and <S%H7725>returns;<s%> And <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H5750>anymore,<s%> For <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> with My <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1523>Rejoice<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion!<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> [in triumph,] O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H4428>king<s%> is <S%H935>coming<s%> to you; He is <S%H6662>just<s%> and <S%H3467>endowed<s%> with <S%H3467>salvation,<s%> <S%H6041>Humble,<s%> and <S%H7392>mounted<s%> on a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> Even on a <S%H5895>colt,<s%> the <S%H1121>foal<s%> of a <S%H860>donkey.<s%>

And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> from <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> And the <S%H5483>horse<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> And the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%> And He will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> And His <S%H4915>dominion<s%> will be from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And from the <S%H5104>River<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

As for you <S%H1571>also,<s%> because of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of [My] <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, I have <S%H7971>set<s%> your <S%H615>prisoners<s%> <S%H7971>free<s%> from the <S%H369>waterless<s%> <S%H4325><s%> <S%H953>pit.<s%>

<S%H7725>Return<s%> to the <S%H1225>stronghold,<s%> O <S%H615>prisoners<s%> who have the <S%H8615>hope;<s%> This <S%H1571>very<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> I am <S%H5046>declaring<s%> that I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> to you.

For I will <S%H1869>bend<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as My <S%H7198>bow,<s%> I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%> And I will <S%H5782>stir<s%> up your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> O <S%H3120>Greece;<s%> And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> you like a warrior's <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, And His <S%H2671>arrow<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> like <S%H1300>lightning;<s%> And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> will <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> And will <S%H1980>march<s%> in the <S%H9370>storm<s%> <S%H9370>winds<s%> of the <S%H8486>south.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H1598>defend<s%> them. And they will <S%H398>devour,<s%> and <S%H3533>trample<s%> on the <S%H9521>sling<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> And they will <S%H8354>drink,<s%> [and] be <S%H1993>boisterous<s%> as with <S%H3196>wine;<s%> And they will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> like a [sacrificial] <S%H4219>basin,<s%> [Drenched] like the <S%H2106>corners<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> them in that <S%H3117>day<s%> As the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of His <S%H5971>people;<s%> For [they are as] the <S%H68>stones<s%> of a <S%H5145>crown,<s%> <S%H5264>Sparkling<s%> in His <S%H127>land.<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2898>comeliness<s%> and <S%H3308>beauty<s%> [will be] theirs! <S%H1715>Grain<s%> will make the <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5107>flourish,<s%> and <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> the <S%H1330>virgins.<s%>
